title: Ep 462 | Jase Tests Out a Bible Tweet & Phil Shocks a Casino
description:
Jase returns to social media after a break and tries out Twitter with a Bible verse, and the response was not what he was expecting. Phil can't help but bring up his faith in Jesus when he finds himself in the middle of a crowded casino. Jase tells a story about the worst injury he has ever had, involving a three-legged race with a short person. And Al discusses Christians who tend to isolate within their churches into groups who think just like they do.

Sign up to watch the Unashamed overtime show, only on BlazeTV:  https://BlazeTV.com/Unashamed
